cpb_vouchers_add_explain: Valid vouchers will be used towards the payment of new bills.
cpb_vouchers_add_explain_bis: Whenever an invoice is issued, the amount owed is debited from your Cloud credit (see below), then in turn from your Digital LaunchPad account and then from your loyalty account. And lastly, your potential debit balance is paid using the payment method we have on file (details regarding those 3 payment methods are available in the "Billing" section of your control panel).
cpb_vouchers_get_error: Oops. We're unable to display list of vouchers.
cpb_vouchers_table_error: Unable to display list of vouchers.
cpb_vouchers_available_credit_cell_info: Credit used automatically towards your next bills
cpb_vouchers_add_error: Oops. We are unable to add this voucher. Please try again.
cpb_vouchers_add_error_no_longer_valid_o: This voucher is no longer valid or has already been used.
cpb_vouchers_credit_comment: Public Cloud credit may not be transferred or reimbursed. It has no monetary value and any credit not used within 13 months will be lost.
